data.text: @hishamwehbi she could’ve done the same when asked about him. i used to love her, and i think she is a very good artist, her music is dope, but how she pushed all the blame onto him the second she was put in the spotlight for getting engaged so fast after they broke up? that’s trashy.

@hishamwehbi i think as an artist, and as someone who once loved him, i think she could’ve been more thoughtful with what she decided to tell her fans. i’m sure he’s really hurt by her getting engaged right after they break up but instead of being a dick and talking shit he was very polite,

@hishamwehbi she changed her story though. at 1st it was due to both having busy schedules. it wasn’t until her & pete got together that she decided to tell the world his business. the way she said it was low class,&from this interview w/him he talks about his sobriety https://t.co/8OGTe1JJpM

@h2gkmoari even if his sobriety was an issue, she could’ve handled the situation better. she said she’s not his babysitter and honestly in my opinion i think it was a low blow on her part to tell the world his business. she could’ve just stuck to the scheduling excuse like she did at 1st

@h2gkmoari https://t.co/8OGTe1JJpM yeah that could be true but here he talks about how even though he got a DUI that he hasn’t had a problem with the shit he used to. and even so, when they originally broke up they said it was due to busy schedules, and later she mentioned his sobriety
